body:
Hello everyone,

I've played (very sparingly) on Avicus for like 9 months for like an hour and a half total, but now I'm magically here as a developer and I'll be working alongside IvyCode.  So yeah.  Hi!

I should probably mention that I'm not yet listed as staff, that'll happen in a few days.

Oh and btw AMA.

<3 Spencer
body_tagged:

I've played (very sparingly) on Avicus for like 9 months for like an hour and a half total, but now I'm magically here as a developer and I'll be working alongside IvyCode.  So yeah.  Hi!

I should probably mention that I'm not yet listed as staff, that'll happen in a few days.

Oh and btw AMA.

<3 Spencer
